title: Chimera

|   | A grotesque parody of nature, this fantastical creature consists of three individual beasts combined into one. |

## Useful Info

**Chimeras** are 3-headed hybrid monsters that can only be generated by evoking the [box of beasts](/Box_of_beasts "Box of beasts"). They use the primary attacks of the second two monsters as its auxiliary attacks and can use spells and special abilities from all three monsters.

The three parts of a chimera are chosen from this list: [Butterfly](/Butterfly "Butterfly"), [Rat](/Rat "Rat"), [Bat](/Bat "Bat"), [Jackal](/Jackal "Jackal"), [Adder](/Adder "Adder"), [Hound](/Hound "Hound"), [Water moccasin](/Water_moccasin "Water moccasin"), [Sky beast](/Sky_beast "Sky beast"), [Crocodile](/Crocodile "Crocodile"), [Hog](/Hog "Hog"), [Ice beast](/Ice_beast "Ice beast"), [Yak](/Yak "Yak"), [Polar bear](/Polar_bear "Polar bear"), [Wyvern](/Wyvern "Wyvern"), [Wolf](/Wolf "Wolf"), [Alligator](/Alligator "Alligator"), [Grizzly bear](/Grizzly_bear "Grizzly bear"), [Warg](/Warg "Warg"), [Elephant](/Elephant "Elephant"), [Griffon](/Griffon "Griffon"), [Black bear](/Black_bear "Black bear"), [Catoblepas](/Catoblepas "Catoblepas"), [Death yak](/Death_yak "Death yak"), [Anaconda](/Anaconda "Anaconda"), [Raven](/Raven "Raven"), [Dire elephant](/Dire_elephant "Dire elephant"), [Dragon](/Dragon "Dragon"), [Ancient bear](/Ancient_bear "Ancient bear"), [Apis](/Apis "Apis"), [Hellephant](/Hellephant "Hellephant") and [Golden dragon](/Golden_dragon "Golden dragon")

## History

- Chimeras were replaced by [mutant beasts](/Mutant_beast "Mutant beast") in [0.17](/0.17 "0.17").
- Chimeras were added in [0.13](/0.13 "0.13").

Type chimera, chimera

A grotesque parody of nature, this fantastical creature consists of three individual beasts combined into one.

Useful Info

Chimeras are 3-headed hybrid monsters that can only be generated by evoking the box of beasts. They use the primary attacks of the second two monsters as its auxiliary attacks and can use spells and special abilities from all three monsters.

The three parts of a chimera are chosen from this list: Butterfly, Rat, Bat, Jackal, Adder, Hound, Water moccasin, Sky beast, Crocodile, Hog, Ice beast, Yak, Polar bear, Wyvern, Wolf, Alligator, Grizzly bear, Warg, Elephant, Griffon, Black bear, Catoblepas, Death yak, Anaconda, Raven, Dire elephant, Dragon, Ancient bear, Apis, Hellephant and Golden dragon

History

  • Chimeras were replaced by mutant beasts in 0.17.
  • Chimeras were added in 0.13.

They use the primary attacks of the second two monsters as its auxiliary attacks and can use spells and special abilities from all three monsters. The three parts of a chimera are chosen from this list: [[Butterfly]], [[Rat]], [[Bat]], [[Jackal]], [[Adder]], [[Hound]], [[Water moccasin]], [[Sky beast]], [[Crocodile]], [[Hog]], [[Ice beast]], [[Yak]], [[Polar bear]], [[Wyvern]], [[Wolf]], [[Alligator]], [[Grizzly bear]], [[Warg]], [[Elephant]], [[Griffon]], [[Black bear]], [[Catoblepas]], [[Death yak]], [[Anaconda]], [[Raven]], [[Dire elephant]], [[Dragon]], [[Ancient bear]], [[Apis]], [[Hellephant]] and [[Golden dragon]] ==History== *Chimeras were replaced by [[mutant beast]]s in [[0.17]]. *Chimeras were added in [[0.13]].
